name: News Corporation
bossPosition: EVP, Global Head of Government Affairs
goal: News Corporation is a global, diversified media and information services company focused on creating and distributing authoritative and engaging content to consumers throughout the world. The company comprises businesses across a range of media, including: news and information services, book publishing, cable network programming in Australia, digital real estate services, digital education, and pay-TV distribution in Australia. Headquartered in New York, the activities of News Corporation are conducted primarily in the United States, Australia, and the United Kingdom.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Culture, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Sport, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
EU Copyright Reform
General Data Protection Regulation
Anti Money Laundering Directive
VAT Harmonization
Audio Visual Media Services Directive
